snippet.title: KORG Gadget for Nintendo Switch v2 | Make music together online
snippet.description:
Make music together online: KORG Gadget for Nintendo Switch version 2.0 is now available - http://www.korg.com/news/2018/1214/

KORG Gadget for Nintendo Switch - which allows up to 4 people to collaborate in making music together - has received an upgrade to version 2.0. This version contains a new long-awaited feature - online multi-player compatibility!
You can now make music together with friends anywhere in the world from the comfort of your home. You can collaborate on a track together. Or arrange and show your music however you like to your collaborators. Experience a new sensory game-like style of music-making.


And please visit the special site of KORG Gadget for Nintendo Switch!
http://gadget.korg.com/nintendo_switch/

Download at Nintendo e-shop.
https://www.nintendo.com/games/detail...

KORG Gadget for Nintendo Switch was jointly developed with DETUNE Ltd and is sold by DETUNE Ltd.
http://www.detune.co.jp/

Music Composed and Programmed by Masaki Iwata


Like/Follow us:
KORG app
